Create a virtual reality simulation that allows you to experience how others completed their tasks seamlessly.
Find a tutor or coach who specializes in your area of interest and can guide you through the process of completing tasks efficiently.
Create a list of tasks that you need to complete and prioritize them based on their importance and urgency.
Use a time-tracking app to monitor how much time you spend on each task and identify areas where you can improve your efficiency.
Take breaks throughout the day to recharge and prevent burnout, which can lead to decreased productivity and increased jealousy.
